MAME 2003-Plus is the only emulator that renders the crowd, but has major control issues and lots of visual problems. Cannot use R-Stick w/lr-mame or lr-mame2016 due to r-analog issues -- but since 2016 is the most solid for gameplay:  Ideal controller setup:  May L-Stick to DPad controls and Map R-Stick controls to Buttons!  Works well this way and bypasses the 2016 controller bug. 2016 is fast enough to support dual monitors, so turn on with MAME Video Options if desired.
Gambling, but interesting. Hit F2 on maiden run. Reset after.
Recommend: Set Buttons 1-3 to L1, R1 and L2/R2. Also set  AD Stick to R-analog stick. Set AD Stick 2 to L-analog
